name: Clippox Exodus
description:
Clippox Exodus is a Action Adventure game, in a 2D Universe of handmade illustrations, with fantasy aesthetics.

The Clippox lived inside a big sacred tree, protected from insects and other jungle dangers, but one night the rays of a relentless storm, destroyed the sacred tree and half of the Clippox. It is then, when the leader, the Great Shaman decides to leave searching for the Promised Land in order to find a new home.

COOL FEATURES ---
-A world created from handmade fantasy illustrations.
- Amazing Locations.
- Easy and addictive gameplay.
- Fight against powerful enemies with incredible magic.
- A history full of surprises.
